#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
main()
{
       int t,z,z1,flag,i,j;
       char m[100000],w[1000000],temp;
	 	cin>>t;
       while(t--)
	   {
	   	flag=0;
	   char	a[26]={0},b[26]={0};
	   	  cin>>m;
	   	  cin>>w;
	   	  z=strlen(m);
	   	  z1=strlen(w);
	   	   if(z!=z1)
	   	   {
	   	   	  cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	   	   	  continue;
			  }
		  	   for(i=0;i<z;i++)
	   	  {
	   	  	a[m[i]-97]++;
	   	  	b[w[i]-97]++;
	   	  }
		  
	   	  for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	   	  {
	   	  	if(a[i]!=b[i])
	   	  	{
	   	  		flag=1;
	   	  		break;
				 }
		  }
		  if(flag==1)
		  cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		  else
		  cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	   }      
}
